page.title: 10Recreation in Drayton
page.content: {Evening Activities Brownies meet in Drayton Hall weekly. Girl Guides meet in Drayton Hall weekly. Army Cadets meet at Drayton School weekly. Friends of Drayton School meet monthly. Drayton Country Music Club has monthly Saturday dances. Drayton Players,an amateur dramatic group, put on three plays a year. Drayton Wives Group meets monthy in Drayton Hall to raise money for charity. The Women's Institute meet monthly in Drayton Hall. Drayton Youth Club meet weekly in Drayton Hall. A bell ringing group meets St.Peter's Church.
